oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Antibacterial effect of herbs and berries against Salmonella, Listeria and E. coli
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jensen, Martin
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Brief presentation of the investigated herbs and berries and how to prepare stable extracts that can be stored for 1 year.
